definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: Think about it: who needs whom?
sentences.chinese: 想想，到底是谁离不开谁？

sentences.english: Presently, Topics of cars are hanging on my lips. One in three words escaping from my lips has something to do with cars.
sentences.chinese: 现在，嘴边常常念叨着车，三句话离不开车的话题。

sentences.english: Women hate men who can't live without booze, sex and cigars.
sentences.chinese: 女人厌恶离不开烟酒和性的男人。

sentences.english: Because people have lives. And now, people with lives also have broadband.
sentences.chinese: 因为人们需要活力，而且现在人们的生活离不开宽带。

sentences.english: The health mental quality can't be divorced from humanistic spirit edification.
sentences.chinese: 健康的心理品质离不开人文精神的陶养。

sentences.english: Its surface like a pool, so that fish can not do without.
sentences.chinese: 它就像一池的春水，让鱼儿离不开。

sentences.english: Many types of nonthermal escape involve ions.
sentences.chinese: 很多非热逸过程都离不开离子的参与。

sentences.english: In the lives which the religion leads, often cannot leave gymnosophists psychological activity.
sentences.chinese: 在宗教修行中，一般离不开修行者的心理活动。

sentences.english: China cannot develop itself in isolation of the world. And the world benefits from China’s development.
sentences.chinese: 中国发展离不开世界，也惠及世界。

sentences.english: At the same time, China's prosperity depends on the United State s.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，中国的繁荣也离不开美国。

sentences.english: As runing water is to fish, so air is to man.
sentences.chinese: 咱们离不开空气，犹如鱼儿离不开水。

sentences.english: As runing water is to fish, so air is to man.
sentences.chinese: 咱们离不开空气，犹如鱼儿离不开水。

sentences.english: Business kept her bound to the company.
sentences.chinese: 她的业务使她离不开这家公司。

sentences.english: As runing waterdrop is to fish, so waterdrop is to man.
sentences.chinese: 咱们离不开空气，犹如鱼儿离不开水。

sentences.english: As runing waterdrop is to fish, so waterdrop is to man.
sentences.chinese: 咱们离不开空气，犹如鱼儿离不开水。

sentences.english: Eat up high-caloric food and can't give up coke-cola.
sentences.chinese: 吃高热量的夜宵离不开可口可乐。

definition: cannot do without/to be unavoidable/are bound to be many
see 必不可少[bi4 bu4 ke3 shao3]
not a single one is dispensable/can't do without either
of the utmost importance/of highest priority
see 眾所周知|众所周知[zhong4 suo3 zhou1 zhi1]
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
